name: Python 3 with Streamlit
updateContentCommand:
echo 'üîÑ Updating system and installing dependencies'; \
  [ -f packages.txt ] && echo 'üì¶ Installing system packages' && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y && xargs -a packages.txt sudo apt-get install -y || echo 'No system packages to install'; \
  [ -f requirements.txt ] && echo 'üêç Installing Python dependencies' && pip install --user -r requirements.txt || echo 'No Python requirements to install'; \
  pip install --user streamlit; \
  echo '‚úÖ Dependencies installed.'

postAttachCommand.server:
echo 'üöÄ Starting Streamlit...' && \
    streamlit run app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
